typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true,
	wildcardPaths:['jawiki-latest-pages-articles.xml']) ~> xml
xml select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selection
